doc.title: Modern English
doc.plot: Wade Rawlins, Britain's top undercover gossip columnist, is sent to the countryside to cover a story. Life, however, has other plans for Wade when, through a series of hilarious mishaps, he winds up disheveled and stripped of his identity on the doorstep of the of the eccentric Kilburn family's remote sheep farm. Mistaking Wade for a charity case, the charmingly eccentric Lady Kilburn takes him in to the distress of the rest of her family. Upon meeting Lady Kilburn's fiery eldest daughter, Gerry, Wade plays along with the misunderstanding. He soon finds himself falling head over heels in love with Gerry and is faced with a major dilemma -- to write or not to write about her eccentric family.
